attributes.action: Reinstate the origional rules for the BCG injection policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am only sixteen years old, but my sister is in the year she was supposed to have her BCG injection. 
Today, she received a letter stating that she will not receive the vaccination due to a new policy. I do not know if it is too late to change, but I beleive it is worth a chance. NHS funding has been cut, so it is understandable changes have to be made, but my family and I think that this is outrageous. If this country cares more about the Olympics than the Health Service I think there is something very wrong.
